calculateAmount(bytes).details: This public view function calculates the amount of a token based on a set of input parameters. It decodes the parameters, retrieves the necessary information from a Lyra strategy, and calculates the amount based on the option type and related factors.

params.parameters: The encoded parameters for the calculation.

returns.amount: The calculated amount of the token.
returns.token: The address of the token to be calculated.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

OpenPositionByLyra(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Emitted when a position is opened using the Lyra protocol.

calculateAmount(bytes).notice: Calculate the amount of a token based on provided parameters.

userdoc.notice: A contract for building and processing Lyra option transactions.
